net.sf.jclec.mo.algorithm

Class MOOnlyRecombinatorAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm
      • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.PopulationAlgorithm
        • net.sf.jclec.mo.algorithm.MOECAlgorithm
          • net.sf.jclec.mo.algorithm.MOGeneticAlgorithm
            • net.sf.jclec.mo.algorithm.MOOnlyRecombinatorAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.IAlgorithm, net.sf.jclec.IConfigure, net.sf.jclec.IPopulation, net.sf.jclec.ISystem, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC, IMOAlgorithm, net.sf.jclec.util.random.IRandGenFactory

    public class MOOnlyRecombinatorAlgorithm
extends MOGeneticAlgorithm
    This class implements a genetic algorithm in which only recombination is performed. By default, the genetic operator is applied to all the individuals within the population.

    HISTORY:

    • (AR|JRR|SV, 1.0, March 2018) First release.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aurora Ramirez (AR), Jose Raul Romero (JRR), Sebastian Ventura (SV)

    Knowledge Discovery and Intelligent Systems (KDIS) Research Group: http://www.uco.es/grupos/kdis

    See Also:
    MOGeneticAlgorithm, Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration settings)

        Specific parameters for MOAlgorithm:

        • mo-strategy: MOStrategy (complex)

          Multi-objective evolutionary strategy

        Specific parameters for MOGeneticAlgorithm:

        • recombinator IRecombinator (complex)

          Crossover operator.

          • [@rec-prob] (double): Crossover probability.
        • mutator IMutator (complex)

          Mutator operator.

          • [@mut-prob] (double): Mutation probability.

        Since this type of algorithm does not use the mutation operator, only the recombinator configuration will be retrieved from the configuration file.

        Specified by:
        configure in interface net.sf.jclec.IConfigure
        Overrides:
        configure in class MOGeneticAlgorithm
